alert.note: Alert for Las Vegas Valley; Northeast Clark County; Western Clark and Southern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 21 at 9:55AM PST until February 21 at 8:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...In Nevada, Northeast Clark County, Western Clark and Southern Nye County and Las Vegas Valley. In California, Cadiz Basin. * WHEN...From 9 AM PST /10 AM MST/ to 8 PM PST /9 PM MST/ Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...For the Las Vegas Valley, highest wind gusts are expected west of Interstate 15, specifically the Mountains Edge, Southern Highlands, and Summerlin areas.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Las Vegas Valley; Northeast Clark County; Western Clark and Southern Nye County
